Text: It somehow isn't picking up any seeders although I am seeding and all seems fine ?!? Just go for it....
Thanks, but please you should keep the release name in the file name, for each episode.  This will make finding matching subtitles much harder...
All file names contain episode number and their release name as listed on IMDB. So I am not sure what your problem is....

...ah, it dawned on me. You mean the original release title as posted like Legend.of.the.Seeker.S02E02.HDTV.XviD-2HD.avi etc....

....will keep in mind for the next time ;-)

Good one friends.
V-9, A-9
All the files work just fine 
many thanks to the pirate.  cheers!!!

Wow the show only went 2 seasons? Just read up on it some earlier after finishing Game of Thrones, and I guess this has been canceled. 

 Which doesn't make sense, it was pretty good from what I did see of it already.

 I skipped watching it on TV after awhile since it seemed like something better watched together instead of broken apart by weeks, really thought there would have been a lot more catching up to do than this.

 But it seems my waiting was no better served, seeing as it will never come to an end.. now i'm just sad :(

 Ty for the upload, and especially to everyone else for still seeding this one (all the individual files are dead).
appreciated - just discovered nice to have packed in a single torrent -
Gotta love AVI, i damn the mkv files to hell=earth BTW i live in paradise. Thanks 4 the up
